original_text: The angel answered, ‘I am called Gabriel. My place is to stand in front of God. I am always ready to work for God. He has sent me to speak to you. He told me that I should tell you this good news.
korean_text: 천사가 대답하여 이르되 나는 하나님 앞에 서 있는 가브리엘이라 이 좋은 소식을 전하여 네게 말하라고 보내심을 받았노라

sentences.original_text: My place is to stand in front of God
sentences.korean_translation: 내 자리는 하나님 앞에 서는 것이다

sentences.original_text: I am always ready to work for God
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 항상 하나님을 위해 일할 준비가 되어있다

sentences.original_text: He has sent me to speak to you
He told me that I should tell you this good news
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 내게 너에게 이 좋은 소식을 전하라고 말했다
